questions: i need to report an emergency
how do i send an emergency alert
how do i notify about an emergency
how do i make an emergency report
how do i contact emergency services
how do i get help in an emergency
how do i file an emergency report
how do i submit an emergency
how do i send an alert
how do i use the app to report an emergency
answers: To report an emergency, tap the emergency type (Police, Fire, Medical, Disaster) on the home screen. Then, fill in the details, attach a photo or video if possible, and submit your report. Our team will respond as quickly as possible.
Tap the emergency type on the home screen, fill in the details, and submit your report. We'll respond as soon as possible.
Select the type of emergency and follow the instructions to submit your report.
Open the app, choose the emergency type, and provide as much detail as you can.
Just open the app, pick the emergency type, and send your report.
Choose the emergency type, fill out the form, and tap submit.
You can report an emergency by selecting the type and providing details in the app.
Alert Liberia is a modern emergency response app designed to help you quickly connect with the nearest emergency teams, report incidents, and receive safety guidance. Your safety is our priority.
Alert Liberia helps you report emergencies and get help fast.
This app connects you to emergency services and provides safety information.
Alert Liberia is your tool for fast emergency reporting and updates.

questions: how do i add a photo
how do i add a video
answers: When filling out the emergency report form, tap the 'Add Photo/Video' button. You can then select a photo or video from your device to help responders better understand your situation.
Use the 'Add Photo/Video' option in the report form to upload images or videos.
Yes, you can attach photos or videos to your emergency report for more details.

questions: what to do if someone is hurt
answers: If someone is injured, call emergency services immediately (4455). If safe, provide first aid: stop any bleeding with clean cloth, keep the person calm and still, and do not move them unless absolutely necessary. Wait for professional help.
Call 4455 for help. If safe, give first aid and keep the person calm.
Do not move the injured person unless necessary. Call for help and provide basic first aid if you can.

questions: how do i turn on location
answers: When prompted, tap 'Allow' to enable location. You can also enable location in your device settings for this app. Accurate location helps us send help to you faster.
Go to your device settings and allow location access for Alert Liberia.
Make sure your phone's location services are turned on for the app.

questions: how do i use the ai chat
what can i ask the chatbot
answers: Type your question or describe your emergency in the chat box. The AI can provide safety tips, first aid instructions, and answer questions about using the app.
You can ask me about emergencies, first aid, or how to use the app.
Just type your question and I'll do my best to help.

questions: what number do i call for emergencies
who do i call in an emergency
answers: For emergencies in Liberia, call 4455. You can also use this app to report emergencies and get help.
Dial 4455 for emergency assistance in Liberia.
The emergency number is 4455.

questions: how do i see my reports
how can i check my submitted reports
answers: Tap the 'My Reports' section in the app menu to view all your submitted emergency reports and their status.
Go to 'My Reports' in the menu to see your past reports.
You can view your submitted reports and their status in the 'My Reports' section.

questions: how do i contact the police
answers: You can contact the police by selecting 'Police' on the home screen and submitting a report, or by calling 4455 for immediate assistance.
Tap 'Police' in the app or call 4455 for police emergencies.

questions: how do i contact the fire department
answers: Select 'Fire' on the home screen to report a fire emergency, or call 4455. Provide your location and details for a faster response.
For fire emergencies, use the app or call 4455.

questions: how do i contact medical help
answers: For medical emergencies, select 'Medical' on the home screen or call 4455. If possible, provide details about the injury or illness.
Tap 'Medical' in the app or call 4455 for an ambulance.

questions: how do i get disaster updates
answers: Check the 'News' section in the app for the latest disaster updates, safety tips, and official alerts.
Go to the News section for disaster updates and safety information.

questions: how do i change my language
answers: Currently, the app is in English. Future updates may include support for more languages. Let us know if you need help in your local language.
Language support is coming soon. For now, the app is only in English.
Yes, your information is kept private and secure. We only use your data to provide emergency assistance and do not share it without your consent.
Your data is protected and only used to help you in emergencies.

questions: can i use this app offline
answers: Some features may work offline, but reporting emergencies and getting real-time help requires an internet connection.
You need an internet connection to report emergencies and get updates.

questions: what should i do during a fire
answers: If there's a fire, leave the building immediately if safe. Stay low to avoid smoke, use stairs (not elevators), and call 4455 or report via the app. Do not re-enter the building until it's declared safe.
Leave the area, avoid smoke, and call 4455 for help.

questions: what should i do during a flood
answers: Move to higher ground immediately. Avoid walking or driving through flood waters. Stay informed via the app's news section and follow official instructions.
Stay away from flood waters and move to a safe place.

questions: how do i update the app
answers: If you installed from the app store, check for updates there. If using the web version, refresh your browser to get the latest features.
Visit your app store to update, or refresh your browser for the latest version.

questions: how do i reset my password
answers: Currently, the app does not require a password. Your device is your key. If you have issues, contact support.
No password is needed for this app. Contact support if you have trouble accessing your account.

questions: what should i do if i feel unsafe
answers: If you feel unsafe, move to a safe location if possible and contact emergency services immediately. You can also use this app to report your situation.
Find a safe place and call 4455 or use the app to report your situation.
Yes, you can submit reports without entering your name. However, providing contact information can help responders reach you faster.
You may report emergencies anonymously, but contact info helps us respond better.

questions: how do i share my location
answers: When prompted, tap 'Allow' to share your location. This helps emergency teams find you quickly.
Enable location services on your device and allow the app to access your location.

questions: how do i cancel a report
answers: If you need to cancel a report, please contact emergency services directly or use the chat to explain your situation.
To cancel a report, contact support or explain your situation in the chat.

questions: what should i do if the app is not working
answers: Try closing and reopening the app, or refreshing your browser. If the problem continues, contact support for help.
Restart the app or your device. If issues persist, contact support.

questions: how do i get first aid tips
answers: Ask me about any first aid situation (e.g., 'How do I treat a burn?'), and I'll provide step-by-step instructions.
Type your first aid question and I'll give you instructions.

questions: can i use this app for someone else
answers: Yes, you can report emergencies for others. Please provide as much detail as possible to help responders.
You may use the app to report emergencies for someone else in need.

questions: how do i know help is coming
how will i know if help is on the way
answers: After submitting a report, you'll see it in 'My Reports'. Our team will contact you if more information is needed.
You will receive updates in the app and may be contacted if more details are needed.

questions: how do i attach my location to a report
answers: When submitting a report, your location is automatically included if you have enabled location services.
Make sure location is enabled on your device; the app will attach it to your report.

questions: how do i get safety tips
how can i get safety information
answers: You can ask me for safety tips about any emergency, or check the 'News' section for official advice.
Type your safety question here or visit the News section for tips.
I'm here to provide safety adviceâ€”just ask your question!

questions: when can I call the helpline
answers: The emergency helpline (4455) is available 24/7, every day.
You can call the emergency helpline (4455) at any time, day or night.
The helpline is open all day, every day.

questions: what should i do during an armed robbery
answers: If you are experiencing an armed robbery, do not resist. Try to stay calm, avoid sudden movements, and do not look directly at the robbers. When safe, use the app or call 4455 to report the incident.
Your safety is most important. Do not fight back during a robbery. Report the incident as soon as you are safe.

questions: how do i report gender-based violence
answers: To report gender-based or domestic violence, use the app and select the appropriate emergency type, or call 4455. All reports are confidential and will be handled with care.
You can report abuse or violence through the app or by calling 4455. Your information will be kept private.

questions: how do i get updates about disease outbreaks
answers: Check the News section in the app for updates on disease outbreaks and health alerts in Liberia.
We provide health and epidemic updates in the News section. Stay informed for your safety.

questions: can i use the app if i have no credit
does the app work without airtime
can i report emergency without credit
answers: Yes, you can use the app to report emergencies even if you have no credit or airtime, as long as you have an internet connection.
No airtime is needed to use the app for reporting emergencies. Just ensure you are connected to the internet.

questions: how do i help during a road accident
what to do if i see a car crash
answers: If you witness a road accident, ensure your own safety first. Call 4455 or use the app to report the accident, provide details and location. If safe, offer basic first aid and wait for emergency services.
Report the accident using the app or by calling 4455. Do not move injured persons unless there is immediate danger.
